```javascript
import axios from 'axios'

const service = axios.create({
  baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_BASE_API,
  timeout: 10000
})

// è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼ˆæ·»åŠ tokenï¼‰

  response => response.data,
  error => {

    }
    return Promise.reject(error)

)
```

**APIæ¨¡å—ï¼ˆapi/{{businessType}}.jsï¼‰**
```javascript
import request from '@/utils/request'

export function get{{pascalCase businessType}}List(params) {
  return request({
    url: '/{{businessType}}/list',
    method: 'get',
    params
  })
}

export function create{{pascalCase businessType}}(data) {
  return request({
    url: '/{{businessType}}',
    method: 'post',
    data
  })
}

export function update{{pascalCase businessType}}(id, data) {
  return request({
    url: `/{{businessType}}/${id}`,
    method: 'put',
    data
  })
}

export function delete{{pascalCase businessType}}(id) {
  return request({
    url: `/{{businessType}}/${id}`,
    method: 'delete'
  })
}
```
